attributes.action: Prevent the Premier League from playing games abroad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Today, news broke that the Premier League would like to add an additional game to the footballing calender to be played abroad.

This is an utter disgrace, and must be strangled at birth. Fans Unite to Save Football.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
